name: UFGSplineMeshGenerationLibrary
comment: Helper library for generating spline meshes, collision and meshes along a splines.

methods.name: BuildSplineMeshesInstanced
methods.comment:
This can be reused between calls to update an existing one.
									If this have mobility Static, it must not be registered before calling this function, if it is then this function have no effect.

methods.name: BuildSplineCollisionBoxes
methods.comment: @note The created collisions are registered and attached to the spline with the same owning actor.

methods.name: BuildSplineCollisionCapsules
methods.comment: @note The created collisions are registered and attached to the spline with the same owning actor.

methods.name: GetNextDistanceExcedingTollerance
methods.comment: @return	bool - returns false if we've reached the end and true if there is still more left
